name: Wizardling
description:
Play as a "young" wizard sent to a world of magic where his final wizardry exam awaits!

Battle untold horrors in the Sea of Tranquility!

Can you survive in this hostile world set on the brink of reality itself?

CONTROLS
  • ESC - Skip cutscene, Pause
  • Left Mouse Button - Fireball
  • Right Mouse Button - Mana Focus
